long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Butterflye Extension: Seamless Content Capture for Product Documentation

Send content to Butterflye with the Butterflye Chrome extension! Designed to streamline your workflow, this handy tool allows users to right-click on any text within Chrome and instantly send it to a project in Butterflye.

Key Features:
	•	Easy Content Capture: Right-click on any piece of text in Chrome and send it directly to a Butterflye project.
	•	Time Saver: Eliminate the hassle of manual copy-pasting and organizing content, giving you more time to focus on creating high-quality documents.
	•	Seamless Integration: Works smoothly within your Chrome browser, ensuring a consistent and intuitive user experience.

Why Install Butterflye?
The Butterflye Chrome extension is a must-have. Ideal for professionals and teams working on product documentation, it simplifies the process of gathering source information. Install Butterflye today and take your content creation to the next level!
